title: Lars Brink Colleague, Friend and Collaborator
abstract:
The Landau-Nordita conference that was held in Moscow in 1981 was the first
place where I met Lars. This "marvellous meeting", as Lars quoted in one of his
reminiscence article, was organised by Alan Luther. It was an event that
generated a long-lasting friendship of scientists from East and West, provided
a background for the future collaborations and, in particular, my own
collaboration with Lars on a supersymmetric high-spin extension of the
Poincar\'e group.
